mph.beans.sessions

Interface ProjectViewerFunctionalities

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BasicUserManagerInterface, ProfessorManagerRemote, StudentManagerRemote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdministratorManager, BasicUserManager, ProfessorManager, StudentManager

    interface ProjectViewerFunctionalities
    This interface provides methods to get information about projects.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Set<ProjectIdDTO> getEnrolledProjectSet(StudentIdDTO theStudentIdDTO) 
      ProjectDTO getProjectInfo(ProjectIdDTO theProjectId)

    • Method Detail

      • getProjectSet

        java.util.Set<ProjectIdDTO> getProjectSet(CourseIdDTO theCourse)
                                          throws InvalidArgumentException,
                                                 UserNotLoggedInException
        Parameters:
        theCourse - the id of the course
        Returns:
        the set of projects enrolled in the course given as parameter
        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentException - if the argument is not valid
        UserNotLoggedInException - if the user is not logged in

      • getEnrolledProjectSet

        java.util.Set<ProjectIdDTO> getEnrolledProjectSet(StudentIdDTO theStudentIdDTO)
                                                  throws InvalidArgumentException,
                                                         UserNotLoggedInException
        Parameters:
        theStudentIdDTO - the id of the student
        Returns:
        the set of projects the student given as parameter is enrolled in
        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentException - if the argument is not valid
        UserNotLoggedInException - if the user is not logged in

      • getProjectInfo

        ProjectDTO getProjectInfo(ProjectIdDTO theProjectId)
                          throws InvalidArgumentException,
                                 UserNotLoggedInException
        Parameters:
        theProjectId - the id of the project
        Returns:
        the DTO containing the information about the project given as parameter
        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentException - if the argument is not valid
        UserNotLoggedInException - if the user is not logged in
